description: Online platform for trading stocks, mutual funds, and more with zero brokerage on delivery trades
target_audience: Individual traders and investors in India

faq.question: What does Zerodha do?
faq.answer: Zerodha is a discount broker offering trading in stocks, commodities, currencies, and mutual funds with zero brokerage on equity delivery trades.

faq.question: What are the account opening charges?
faq.answer: Account opening is free. There's an Annual Maintenance Charge of Rs 300 plus GST per year.

faq.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Yes, we have Kite mobile app for trading and Coin for mutual funds.

faq.question: What is the brokerage structure?
faq.answer: Zero brokerage on equity delivery. Flat Rs 20 per trade for intraday and F&O.

faq.question: Who is this for?
faq.answer: This is for individual traders and investors in India who want low-cost trading.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Account opening is free, and equity delivery trading has zero brokerage. Only pay Rs 300 annual maintenance.
